name: TOWERVATCH
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 (Delay the inevitable) https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/towervatch

Oh no, they triggered the overtime! Stall to stop them from capturing! But they just keep coming!

You're defending in Towervatch and the enemies just triggered the overtime. Send your heroes to stop them and hope for a win... But they just keep coming back to the point!

controls

Left click to deploy heroes

Choose your roster and click on the hero portraits to deploy heroes where you want on the point. Choose strategically where to position each hero to stall the longest!

team
